title: Looking for some casual people to play league with
body:
Hey guys umm so i started to play league since the new rift map went out and played with a couple of friends and it was fun. Recently they moved to Csgo and it sucks playing alone. So if anyone would like to play with me that would be appreciated. Im silver 1 smurf 
IGN: bnertAlI

replies.body: Could use some people to play with DamonW23 im not picky just wanna get better
Feel free to add me for some casual games. I do normals and ranked; not really picky about roles.
Won 50% of my promo games only to be placed in B5 so looking for team-mates that aren't the bottom of the barrel
Yeah I'm down to play some games. I'm currently bronze 1 or 2 (can't remember lol) but climbing pretty fast. I'd be down to play some norms or ranked :)
